snippet.title: WRC 8 | Replicating Reality - Level Design Dev Diary [ESRB]
snippet.description:
Pre-order WRC 8 now : https://buy.wrcthegame.com/

For this level design focused Dev Diary, Art Director, Amaury Beyris and 3D Infographist, Alic Coléno share with us some insights about how they replicated reality in making the circuits as faithful as the real ones. 

#WRC8 will be available the 5th of September 2019 on PlayStation®4, Xbox One, Epic Games Store and in October on Nintendo Switch™.

-------------------------------
For more news on WRC The Official Game, follow us on:

Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/WRCOfficialGame
